alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:51AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Doniphan, Atchison, western Buchanan, Atchison, Holt, southwestern Nodaway, northwestern Platte and western Andrew Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 151 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Rock Port to near Rulo to near Denton. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Atchison, Tarkio, Wathena, Elwood, Mound City, Highland, Troy, Country Club, Rock Port, Oregon, Fairfax, Effingham, Dearborn, Camden Point, Maitland, Amazonia, Rushville, Lancaster and Skidmore. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 26 and 39, and between mile markers 57 and 113. Interstate 229 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
